fields.textblob:
About this Site

Agility CMS is an amazing tool.  Start building something incredible today!

This is a sample blog that showcases how you can use Agility CMS to create an amazing website using some pre-built components.

This site is primarily meant to be used as a blog, but you can use it for whatever you wish!

  • Build your personal portfolio
  • Learn about Headless CMS
  • Learn about Web Development 

About The Technology

This site was built using components licensed from the Treact Project.  There are 52 amazing building blocks to choose from!

This site is built on top of React and uses the amazing Tailwind CSS framework.
